CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL( Maximum_Capacity__c , "6"), "/resource/Bus6" , (IF( ISPICKVAL( Maximum_Capacity__c , "12"), "/resource/Bus12", (IF( ISPICKVAL( Maximum_Capacity__c , "24"), "/resource/Bus24", (IF( ISPICKVAL( Maximum_Capacity__c , "36"), "/resource/Bus36", (IF( ISPICKVAL( Maximum_Capacity__c , "60"), "/resource/Bus60","No Image found" )))))))))
CustomField.label: Bus Image
